summary: This ain't that type of party
description: I'm trying not to even brand it as a "party". I don't want this to be saturated with all the expectations that come with a party. I've had a dream of bringing all my friends together in one place and this is its fulfillment. That's all this is: a celebration.

I'm paying for everything; I'd never do something for myself and expect others to dip into their own pockets just for me. Not how I was raised. You just have to show up and look good without stressing me. Can you do that?
If you don't want to come because it's too much effort to make it to the location, or because you're not familiar with many others on the guest list, that's absolutely fine

summary: This ain't that type of party
description: I'm trying not to even brand it as a "party". I don't want this to be saturated with all the expectations that come with a party. I've had a dream of bringing all my friends together in one place and this is its fulfillment. That's all this is: a celebration.

I'm paying for everything; I'd never do something for myself and expect others to dip into their own pockets just for me. Not how I was raised. You just have to show up and look good without stressing me. Can you do that?
If you don't want to come because it's too much effort to make it to the location, or because you're not familiar with many others on the guest list, that's absolutely fine
If you plan on turning up more than 15mins late, I'll only see that as a sign of disrespect. You're better off staying at home. Don't bother yourself. Really.
